DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis GW427353 , beta-3 adrenergic agonist , retard empty colon increase total colonic transit time .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Effect Of Solabegron ( GW427353 ) On Gastrointestinal Transit In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects evidence current past history suggestive gastrointestinal disease disorder medical illness could compromise interpretation study . clinically significant laboratory result collect screen visit men : body weight great equal 50kg ( 110 lb ) woman : body weight great equal 45kg ( 100 lb ) BMI 18.5 35 kg/m2 Females nursing pregnant . history inflammatory bowel disease history gastric ulcer within 12 month sign informed consent form tobacco user
